query:
SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_pedidos,
  SUM(itemsCount) as total_itens_esperados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales WHERE saleDate >= '2025-09-01' AND saleDate < '2025-10-01') as itens_em_sales
FROM orders
WHERE orderDate >= '2025-09-01' 
  AND orderDate < '2025-10-01'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2JcS2SMt4kXiaZg.root --database e5hjdPqiFqSfQ5APk99tn8 --execute SELECT 
  COUNT(*) as total_pedidos,
  SUM(itemsCount) as total_itens_esperados,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sales WHERE saleDate >= '2025-09-01' AND saleDate < '2025-10-01') as itens_em_sales
FROM orders
WHERE orderDate >= '2025-09-01' 
  AND orderDate < '2025-10-01'
